resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108500</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108500</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207105</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Constitution Toolkit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschaffenheittoolkit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trousse à outils de constitution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Toolkit Do Constitution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Toolkit Di Costituzione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κουτί εργαλείων συνταγμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Caja de herramientas De la Constitución</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This site includes images of newspaper articles (1787), notes Washington and Jefferson wrote on drafts of the Constitution (1787-88), Jefferson's chart of state votes (1788), Washington's diaries (1786-89), Hamilton's speech notes for proposing a plan of government, a Philadelphia map (1752), the broadside Bill of Rights (1791), and other artifacts.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Site schließt Bilder der Zeitungsartikel 
(1787), Anmerkungen Washington ein und Jefferson schrieb auf Entwürfe
des Diagramms der Beschaffenheit (1787-88), Jeffersons Anmerkungen der
Zustandstimmen (1788), der Tagebücher Washingtons (1786-89), der Rede
Hamiltons für das Vorschlagen eines Planes der Regierung, eine 
Philadelphia Karte (1752), die Breitseite Verfassung (1791) und andere
Kunstprodukte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce site inclut des images des articles de journal 
(1787), notes Washington et Jefferson a écrit sur des ébauches du 
diagramme de la constitution (1787-88), du Jefferson les notes des 
voix d'état (1788), des agendas de Washington (1786-89), de Hamilton 
de parole pour proposer un plan de gouvernement, une carte de 
Philadelphie (1752), la déclaration des droits de flanc (1791), 
et d'autres objets façonnés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este local inclui imagens dos artigos de jornal 
(1787), notas Washington e Jefferson escreveu em esboços da carta do 
constitution (1787-88), do Jefferson de votos do estado (1788), de 
diários de Washington (1786-89), de discurso de Hamilton notas 
propondo uma planta do governo, um mapa de Filadélfia (1752), a conta
do broadside de direitas (1791), e outros artifacts.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo luogo include le immagini degli articoli di 
stampa (1787), le note Washington e Jefferson ha scritto sulle brutte 
copie della costituzione (1787-88), tabella del Jefferson di 
dichiara i voti (1788), i diari de Washington (1786-89), note 
di discorso de Hamilton per la proposta del programma del governo, un 
programma de Filadelfia (1752), la fattura dell'attacco dei 
diritti (1791) ed altri manufatti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η περιοχή περιλαμβάνει τις εικόνες των άρθρων 
εφημερίδων (1787), σημειώνει την Ουάσιγκτον και Jefferson 
έγραψε στα σχέδια του συντάγματος (1787-88), του διαγράμματος 
Jefferson των κρατικών ψηφοφοριών (1788), των ημερολογίων της
Ουάσιγκτον (1786-89), των λεκτικών σημειώσεων του Χάμιλτον για 
την πρόταση ενός σχεδίου της κυβέρνησης, ενός χάρτη της 
Φιλαδέλφειας (1752), broadside Bill των δικαιωμάτων 
(1791), και άλλων χειροποίητων αντικειμένων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este sitio incluye imágenes de los artículos 
periodísticos (1787), notas Washington y Jefferson escribió en los 
bosquejos de la carta de la constitución (1787-88), de Jefferson de 
los votos del estado (1788), de los diarios de Washington (1786-89), 
las notas del discurso de Hamilton para proponer un plan del gobierno,
una correspondencia de Philadelphia (1752), la cuenta del costado 
de las derechas (1791), y otros artefactos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207105</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108500</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/constitution-toolkit</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
